```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
Endowments <- read_csv("Endowments.csv")
```

```{r}
tidy_Endowments <- Endowments %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("20"),
               names_to = "year", 
               values_to = "endowment") 
```

```{r}
tidy_Endowments %>% 
  filter(College == "Macalester (MN)") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, endowment)) + 
    geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Macalester's Endowment Over Time", x="Year", y="Endowment (in millions)")
  
```
